run-notes.summary: Completed whatif plugin (modes, synthesis, health checks) and built project communication suite (CHANGELOG, ROADMAP, CONTRIBUTING, issue templates). Tagged v0.1.0.

what-worked.item: Multi-signal confidence scoring produces realistic 40-80% distribution instead of inflated 90%+ clustering
Tier synthesis using Groq produces genuine compound insights with thread-finding prompts
run_tier() DRY refactor eliminated 40+ lines of duplicated code
Keep a Changelog format provides industry-standard transparency
Provider health checks fail fast with helpful messages

what-didnt.item: Tier synthesis scores sometimes low (35-50%) due to longer outputs - prompt could be tighter

friction-events.event: whatif audit revealed 7 spec-implementation gaps requiring prioritization

patterns-observed.pattern: Separating exploration (free models) from synthesis (Claude) is token-economical
Multi-model disagreement is signal, not noise - tier synthesis should preserve tension

next-session.item: Push v0.1.0 tag and test GitHub issue templates render correctly
Tighten tier synthesis prompt to produce punchier compound insights
Wire /whatif command to be discoverable after session restart
